title: Lactate build-up in aquatic animals during dives 3

content.question: The data suggest that Baikal seals can sustain much longer dives than Emperor penguins. Propose a hypothesis that could explain the evolution of different dive responses in Emperor penguins and Baikal seals.

frqParts.text: The data suggest that Baikal seals can sustain much longer dives than Emperor penguins. Propose a hypothesis that could explain the evolution of different dive responses in Emperor penguins and Baikal seals.

skill.text: 3.B: State the null hypothesis or predict the results of an experiment.
